casebody.data:
JONES
v.
CITY OF DURHAM. No. 137A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 25, 2005. Stewart W. Fisher, Carlos E. Mahoney, Robert B. Glenn, Jr., Durham, for Linda Jones.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of April 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (City of Durham, et al.) shall have up to and including the 8th day of June 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of April 2005."
